title: Explore Nearly 2,000 Gun Dealer Inspection Reports
alt: A map and table of gun dealer inspections.
info: For this investigation into the federal government's failure to regulate gun dealers, co-published with USA TODAY, I also parsed and analyzed thousands of pages of documents in Node and R, and then published them in this interactive database built with Sapper and Airtable. I produced explanatory scrollytelling components for the main feature story using Svelte. Shortly afterpublication, Congressional Democrats introduced legislation to tighten the penalties for lawbreaking gun dealers.
